column2: This order of Imams within the Ibadi sect of Islam has functioned since the time of Ibad to maintain the Ibadi's clerical sovereignty.
The Imam is a very holy person in charge of the entire society.
Your wards have a chance to gain increased attribute points during their education and upon reaching adulthood have a chance to lose wicked traits and gain pious ones.
Can more easily convince someone to be less decadent.\n§GRight-click§! a decadent family member in order to §Ynegotiate§! their decadency.
Invite a wise Imam from the society to help you with your religious administration.
Be able to practice §YScholarship§!, §YMystic§! or §YTheologian§! by §Gright-clicking§! yourself.
